locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Waited for hours for a shower while no one was using any showers no lines no nothing was ignored and after a while I was given a shower that wasn‚Äôt clean there was a used bandaid toilet dirty and chunks of hair
A bit above par for TAs. Shower was clean with no wait. Store looked organized and well stocked. Parking area mostly clear of trash.
‚Ä¶ The showers, however, were nice and clean. The shower attendant was polite and had a quick turn around time. ‚Ä¶

The first shower we got had pee in the shower, the service at the restaurant was really not professional, and the laundry was very expensive. Not the best place to spend a lot of time at. You're better off at the Pilot across the street. Th ‚Ä¶
Great spot to exercise, shower, enjoy a good meal and to relax. Also absolutely love the fact that their mechanic shop is open 24-7. Thanks TA.

Probably the worst TA in the country absolutely nothing for breakfast a hot dog for lunch almost $20 to take a shower it's pathetic very embarrassing for a truck stop this place should be ashamed of itself
Everything was good accept for when I went to take a shower. It was half clean spots was on the floor and I was missing a wash cloth

No toilet paper no soap no shower. Great job  TA
THE NEW WAY TO APPRECIATE DRIVERS

Very bad
I came at05:25AM to get a shower today the person on the counter said no shower till 06:00AM now at 06:00AM he said no showers available till 08:00AM
Great shower! Very nice staff.decent prices. Clean too. In my favs now.

locations.description: Truck-stop chain offering fuel & food. Many have amenities such as laundry rooms, showers & lodging.

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ the second time in about 2 months I've stayed at this Pilot location. Both times I have got up early around midnight or 1am  and went in to get a shower and nothing available. The first time I was told it would be at least an hour wait ‚Ä¶

A good place to stop at mid day for a meal and a shower. Later in the day parking would likely be tight. Clean showers, and attentive/friendly staff. Arbys food was good, fast, and staff was great there too. It is a smaller pilot store so ‚Ä¶

Well going off what the other guy said‚Ä¶ looks like it‚Äôs been over a week for sure and all this stuff still isn‚Äôt stocked‚Ä¶ something else ‚Ä¶ went to get a shower and floor was clean when I walked In‚Ä¶. The shower  had water on floor‚Ä¶ didn‚Äôt ‚Ä¶
Pilot stuff really don‚Äôt care about drivers showers ,restrooms dirty.i wait over one hour for shower need to be cleaned but they didn‚Äôt and left without showers .I don‚Äôt give advise any drivers
Great nose-in 96 parking, really nice shower, beer üçª at TA across the street. ‚Ä¶

Here we go again. In typical Pilot fashion. The showers are closed. Sorry for the inconvenience.  Not enough staff I guess to run the place. As a truck driver, I'm not able to just go anywhere else when I'm on a 10 hour break. E-logs see to ‚Ä¶

When it comes to showers stalls I am very particular and there aren't many pilots are not up to par. Victoria really done a wonderful job making sure showers are well clean as should . Like most pilots I've been to aren't the best of care.. ‚Ä¶

Bad place for shower.  No one wants to clean washroom so they add numbers to computer.  Literally waiting 2 hrs for shower no one goes in or out n computer keeps on calling number n opts out after 10 minutes.  Such bad employees playing not ‚Ä¶
Pilot is a good trusty truck stop. You can do some shopping for some necessities while you're on the road grab a burger from Arby's or take a shower.

This stop was very good and clean.
The shower was clean. The store is well stocked. Large parking lot.

locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I stopped in at 12:30 at night for a quick shower and fuel, then I was informed they're only using for showers out of seven but everyone had plenty of time to stand around talking playing on their phones to the point what I just left how do ‚Ä¶
If you're a truck driver and want a hot shower don't stop here. also have a Hardee's but it's taped off at 8am this morning
This woman who works with a guy today doesn't want to let him in the shower, they're stalling for time
‚Ä¶ Sorry for asking a valid question Loves. P.s. My entire company of 30 trucks buys ALL of their fuel at Loves.  Shower was good. (No humans involved using the App.)
Shower rooms are available, super clean and comfortable. The staff was kind and helpful!

‚Ä¶ if she were here this morning. No greeting. Could barely make out the mandatory ‚Äòhave a nice day ‚Äô when she handed me the shower code and turned away. Had to wake her up again to ask for my receipt. Clearly, shower room 5 was not cleaned ‚Ä¶

5/20/22 around 05:00. Was in the shower listening to my music and was told to turn it off. Been driving since 2011 and never had a problem listening to music in the shower. She was quick to tell me to turn off the music but not quick to do ‚Ä¶
Sitting 1 hour for shower even if they don‚Äôt busy. Finally I got the shower which is not clean and worst. I clean myself for. Not coming back
Ladies beware of shower 5. Door doesn't even make contact with door frame on latching side. You can see right in to the room.
The shower wasn‚Äôt cleaned throughly from the previous person.  Friendly staff. Hot water. It will do.

locations.title: Dundee Travel Center
locations.content: Dundee Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I was surprised it was a truck stop when I rolled up. I went for a shower. You get a room to yourself, they clean between guests, and the water was wonderfully warm. It would have been a bit nicer if there was a coat rack, a mat to stand on ‚Ä¶

No showers and bathrooms since covid............. my jaw dropped, honestly. Don't shower because there is imaginary covid. No subs either. Good thing there is parking, because if someone said there is no parking because covid, I'd have ‚Ä¶

locations.title: 145 Auto/Truck Plaza
locations.content: 145 Auto/Truck Plaza may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I was working close by there getting done late and wanting to go Doordaah... I stopped here they have $5 showers and both Bathroom and Shower area are Super Clean!!! I appreciate that!!! Staff on the late shift are Awesome!! üòé ‚Ä¶
Shower was very dirty sewer gas coming up through the drain in floor sink would not drain and was full of hair hot water only lasted about 7 minutes i guess that's what u get for 5 dollars
The last post a month ago nothing changed same nasty shower and restroom
Great place to shower
It's good. Not huge. Chicken but the pizza shop is closed down. No restaurant. One shower, with towels. Scale, not CAT scale. C store, standard gas station stuff.
Great workers here, great , fantastic even Shower(s)here too. Very helpful workers that are here.small place, but decent small, not TOO Small however. Great place to be ...
love the People who work there, They have a beautiful great Shower here, $5.3o.per.
Parking, less expensive fuel, food and shower.  Good place to stop for the night!
Cheap clean $5 shower no towels

locations.title: Madco Truck Plaza
locations.content: Madco Truck Plaza may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: There are 4 showers ‚Ä¶

As a trucker. It‚Äôs the little things that matter to me. I do like my clean showers and I know better than to attempt to shower here. One of the dirtiest truck stops I have ever seen. The people working the counters are not friendly and they ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ New owners. Unfortunately their parking $15 now. Showers are pretty nice all redone. Male cashier comes off by thinking he knows how to run the place by yelling and screaming at employees. Almost like the rich daddy‚Äôs son. As I asked for a ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ if you arent dropping your trailer. People in Subway were rude so I didnt eat there. Bathroom was clean and cashiers were friendly. Dirty parking lot but there wasnt a bunch of running trucks so it was quiet. Only 10 bucks for a shower.

Its really not that bad..parking is 15$ but that's cheaper then a (wal mart) ticket.. but lots got security driving around..subway inside is clean..the store is sorrta small but clean..didn't shower but from just walking in ..I'm sure their ‚Ä¶

Worst place ever charged 10$ for shower with no WATER and towels
Plus bought couple snacks for the road both of them was expired !!
This trash place not recommended at all

Worst truck stop ever!! Paid 10$ for a seemingly nice shower.. All the drains backed up with human fecal matter!! They refused my refund and callwd the cops on me? I will retaliate legally. Prepare for court!!

‚Ä¶ a gas station I've bought everything here from socks to gas to dinner gloves shirts flashlights safety gear Def solution for the truck ... And I've even taken shower here ..it's been years since I've done that but this is the spot for sure
The parking spaces here is pretty big and the service is always great inside. Do not try to come late at not though to get a shower because you will be waiting forever.

It's not Flying J or any of the big boys but coming off the road and need a shower, wash your clothes, grab a sandwich and a scratch off cuz you never know. No frills but it works for a decent break. Even has a tv room.
